actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for an immediate 15 percent cost-of-living increase in social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase by 15 percent the monthly benefits and lump-sum death payments payable under such Title. Directs that the increase in benefits shall be effective for months after May 1975.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an immediate 15 percent cost-of-living increase in social security benefits.
